tag_list: motherhood, parenting, photography, inspirational, blog, kids
overview:
Leonny is a mother two who is passionate about photography and shares the ups and downs of motherhood, parenting tips, arts and crafts ideas and other inspirational thoughts on her Our Everyday Things blog site, http://www.oureverydaythings.com

She was born in Jakarta, Indonesia, was educated in Perth Australia and is now living in Singapore.

As a Christian, she feels the blessings showered upon her is way beyond what she can ever imagine.

She blogs to inspire others and to make a positive impact on parents, families and the world.

image.attribution: Leonny Atmadja / Our Everyday Things
